headline: Here Are Billionaire David Tepper's 5 Biggest Stock Holdings
summary: One of the more prominent hedge fund managers today, Appaloosa Management's David Tepper, has been one of the busiest lately.  On the basis of that document, here are the hedge fund's top five stock positions.  As with the previous filing, the No. 1 slot belongs to a foreign company, Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba Group (NYSE: BABA).
